Scilab function

NAME

    set_node_menu - changes the entries of node names in scigraph menu

CALLING SEQUENCE

set_node_menu(node_names)

PARAMETERS

    • node_names : a column string matrix with size 5. The list of entries for the node name menu

DESCRIPTION

    set_node_menu is used to customize the node name menu .

EXAMPLES

    gname= SCI+"/demos/metanet/mesh10.graph"
scigraph(graph=gname)        
set_node_menu("node menu"+string(1:5)')

SEE ALSO

    set_arc_menu
